data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Saint Georges, Montserrat the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Georges, Montserrat
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 4,700 citizens of the the state of Saint Georges.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Saint Georges with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Saint Georges, Montserrat find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Saint Georges, Montserrat that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Saint Georges, Montserrat that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Spirit, help the people of the the state of Saint Georges to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.
